comments:
Build: I-20041025

Create a site project.

In the site editor, add a feature to the Features to Build section.

Try to drag and drop the feature, or even try to select it, you will get 8 
NPEs back to back.

Konrad,
This is a side effect of the new linking action you added.

Site editor has no outline view.

Created an attachment (id=15463)
77236 patch.txt

> Site editor has no outline view
It has pretty bad implementation of 
abstract protected ISortableContentOutlinePage createContentOutline();
to return null.  We should address it at some point - either provide good
implementation or at least not null dummy one.

In the meantime here is a patch that will tolerate it.

If you need to work with site editer, until you can upgrade the build, deselect
"Link with Editor" in the toolbar of Outline View for PDE editors.

Applied patch.
Site editor is all yours to revamp in M4.
